questions.quesno: Which of the following SQL clauses is used to select data from 2 or more tables?
Which SQL statement selects all rows from a table called Products and orders the result set by ProductID column?
questions.choicea: SELECT * FROM Products ORDERED BY ProductID
questions.choiced: SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY ProductID
questions.ans: SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY ProductID

questions.quesno: The HAVING clause can be used only with ...
What does the SQL FROM clause do?
questions.choiceb: Specifies the columns we are retrieving
questions.choicec: Specifies the tables to retrieve rows from.
questions.choiced: Specifies the tables to retrieve rows from
questions.ans: Specifies the tables to retrieve rows from
